pages.title: Hello World
pages.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Notice
posts.text: Since some invaders keep enteringï¼ŒI have no choice but to close this website(maybe for the time being,maybe forever^^) Thatâ€™s ok,some aspects that I close this web is my reason If you want to know me ,you should type to me instead of staring this web The first aim I create this web is to celebrate oneâ€™s birthday,and soon I put the knowledge I collected to convenient for my friends to look up knowledges ,but ,unfortunately,when I uploaded some my ideas ,some people spread it,which made me feel bad^^ I will close my moments as wellã€the reason is deleted hereã€‘ There are many things for me to do in the daily life,in spite of some negative things happened on sb Thatâ€™s all ,thx for watching Maybe I will renew this web some day in the future ã€ ã•ãã€çŸ¥ã‚‰ã‚“ã‘ã©ï½—ï½—ï½— ã‚ã‚“ãŸèª°â“ï¼¾ï¼¾ ã»ã‚“ã¾ã«ãŠã‚‚ã—ã‚ã‚„ å¤§ããªå¤‰ã‚ã‚‹ã®ã“ã¨ãªã„ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã‘ã©ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ ã§ã‚‚ I am in the middle stage
